page.title: 07INFO. SYSTOMS in Withington
page.content: { Post Office} ___________ The post office is a small part of the village shop. It is well patronised, being used for the payment of bills such as Rates, Electricity and Telephones. Pensions and allowances are collected each week and stamps and money orders are dispensed. { General Information} ___________________ There are three{public noticeboards } in the village. On these villagers inform each other and the public at large of events of interest, including Parish Council meetings and fund raising events.
